name: Cars and Stars
description:
Control a racecar and clear 8 levels by collecting all the stars.

Hearts - give you a life, cones - take away a life, stop signs - get in the way, rainbow question marks - they will either skip the level or end the game, life preservers - clear everything on the level besides the stars, skulls - end game instantly.

unrelated: here is proof that IOI invented hair

(note: the game over screen can be glitchy, if it won't let you play again, just refresh the page)
